projects.title: Event Management for College Clubs - Sigma Events
projects.description: Created an event management platform for college clubs, streamlining event organization and attendance management with distinct admin and user interfaces.
achievements: Implemented user and admin authentication with Google Login/Signup.
Selected for open-source contributions in SWOC Season 4, with active developer involvement.

features.featureDescription: Allows users to switch between light and dark mode as per their comfort.
Stores user's personal information in MongoDB so you don't need to fill same details for every event registration.
Allows users to register and manage events easily and seamlessly.

projects.title: Quiz Website for Institutes - Quizzer
projects.description: Built a full-stack web application for quiz management, incorporating multi-role authentication, real-time malpractice detection, and secure Google login.

features.featureDescription: Supports different user roles (admin, teacher, student) with customized access levels.
Monitors quiz sessions to detect and prevent cheating in real-time.
Secure Google authentication integrated for easy access and account management.

projects.title: Deepfake Detection Platform - Deep Verify
projects.description: Developed a website for deepfake detection using HuggingFace's API, addressing ethical concerns in digital media.

features.featureDescription: Identifies and flags deepfake content using advanced AI techniques.
Utilized HuggingFace's API for efficient deepfake analysis and detection.

responsibilities: Developed a responsive website addressing women's safety, featuring SOS calls, real-time incident updates, and a community feed.
Used the MERN stack with Firebase Firestore for secure data management and Firebase Authentication for user access.
Led a team of 4 developers to build a website enhancing student learning by summarizing PDFs using OCR recognition and AI models.
Designed and implemented a user-friendly UI/UX using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

achievements.title: Google Developer Student Club, NIE Mysore
description: Tech Core Member, contributed to numerous projects and events, and mentored 150+ students during the RootAccess Hackathon.

achievements.title: Girl Geek IEEE Hackathon, VVCE Mysore
description: Secured third place with an innovative website integrating Hugging Face's AI for deepfake detection.

achievements.title: Social Winter of Code 2024
description: My project, Sigma Events, was selected for open-source contributions, with developers actively contributing to the repository.
